item.title: advanced web attacks exploitation preparation
item.description: AWAE WEB-300 - Learn white box web application security in Advanced Web Attacks and Exploitation PentesterLab](https://pentesterlab.com/) https://portswigger.net/web-security/all-materials https://donavan.sg/blog/index.php/2020/03/14/the-awae-oswe-journey-a-review/ https://medium.com/@fasthm00/the-state-of-oswe-c68150210fe4 https://www.anquanke.com/post/id/217301 OSCP OSCP: A 4-year Journey of “Trying Harder” https://github.com/strongcourage/oscp

item.title: build e2e testing env from zero to 1 using Azure Devops
item.description: Design Use yam file intead of command line to operate because of IAC Use test runner doing all of test cases as container Use Azure managed services instead of build-in service by myself Tools Azure DevOps - pipelines/repoes Terrform CLI Docker Installing Required Azure DevOps Extensions Terraform Build & Release Tasks extension Environment build images, push images using Azure DevOps

item.title: About
item.description: Experience 6+ years of software engineering experence in Test Automation, Test Tooling and Infrastructure 4+ years of software devoperment in Game devlopement in C++ Experience with continuouse integration with Jenkins, Azure DevOps Experience with writing automation test case with robot framework in python Experience with to configure automated tests to execute reliably and efficiently in CI/CD environments Experience with finding vulnerability in white-box testing (WIP) Experience with building natived applications in golang (WIP) I am going to learn or write Topics in 2021 Introduce to selenium 4 Execute test case in parallel selenium Grid and selenium 4 Doing API testing for microservices by using PACT Doing integrate testing with testcontainers Experience Sharing in Precision Testing with Golang Native cloud application CI/CD tools - Jenkins X
